mapper.insert: insert into PBCRS_REPORT_REDNCINFSGMT (REDNCINFSGMTSEQNO, RESISTATUS, RESIADDR, RESIPC, RESIDIST, HOMETEL, RESIINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG) values (#{RedncInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ResiStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ResiAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ResiPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ResiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{HomeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ResiInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into PBCRS_REPORT_REDNCINFSGMTM (REDNCINFSGMTSEQNO, RESISTATUS, RESIADDR, RESIPC, RESIDIST, HOMETEL, RESIINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG, ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS) select REDNCINFSGMTSEQNO, RESISTATUS, RESIADDR, RESIPC, RESIDIST, HOMETEL, RESIINFOUPDATE, '0', ETL_DATE,SOURCESYS from PBCRS_REPORT_REDNCINFSGMT where REDNCINFSGMTSEQNO = #{RedncInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.update: update PBCRS_REPORT_REDNCINFSGMT set RESISTATUS = #{ResiStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESIADDR = #{ResiAddr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESIPC = #{ResiPc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESIDIST = #{ResiDist,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HOMETEL = #{HomeTel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESIINFOUPDATE = #{ResiInfoUpDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REPORTFLAG = #{reportflag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where REDNCINFSGMTSEQNO = #{RedncInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select REDNCINFSGMTSEQNO, RESISTATUS, RESIADDR, RESIPC, RESIDIST, HOMETEL, RESIINFOUPDATE, REPORTFLAG from PBCRS_REPORT_REDNCINFSGMT where REDNCINFSGMTSEQNO = #{RedncInfSgmtSeqNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
